summary: A businessman moves to Hong Kong to pursue a career as an artist and falls in love with a prostitute he hires as a model.
cast: William Holden|Nancy Kwan|Sylvia Syms|Michael Wilding|Jacqueline Chan|Laurence Naismith|Yvonne Shima|Andy Ho|Lier Hwang|Bernard Cribbins|Edwina Carroll|Dervis Ward|Marian Spencer|Lionel Blair|David Cargill|Rodney Dines|Ronald Eng|Calvin Hsia|David Langton|Shan Lawrence|Robert Lee|Anthony Parker|Toke Townley|Ronald Wilson
title: El mundo de Suzie Wong
